segments.description: A close-up shot of a young adult's determined face as they prepare to ride a BMX bike. The camera captures the intensity in their eyes, with a slight zoom in to emphasize focus. The background features a vibrant skatepark filled with graffiti art, under soft natural light.
segments.visualPrompt: Close-up of a young adult's focused face, preparing to ride a BMX bike in a colorful skatepark. Soft natural light accentuates their determination. The camera slightly zooms in to capture the intensity in their eyes.
visualPromptAlternatives: Wide shot of the skatepark, showcasing multiple riders preparing for action, all under soft natural light, creating a lively atmosphere.
Close-up of the BMX bike's wheels spinning as the rider gets ready, with a blurred background to emphasize speed and anticipation.
Side profile shot of the rider adjusting their helmet, with the skatepark in the background, showing other extreme sports activities happening.
Over-the-shoulder shot of the rider looking down the ramp, capturing their perspective and the excitement ahead.
segments.audioNotes: Music: Upbeat electronic music with a fast tempo.

segments.description: The rider takes off down the ramp, performing an impressive trick mid-air. The camera follows with a dynamic tracking shot, showcasing the thrill of the moment. The sun shines brightly, creating a vibrant and exciting atmosphere, while the energy drink can is strategically placed in the corner of the frame.
segments.visualPrompt: Dynamic tracking shot of the rider launching off the ramp, performing an impressive trick in mid-air. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene as the energy drink can is visible in the corner of the frame, symbolizing the boost they receive.
visualPromptAlternatives: Slow-motion shot of the rider mid-trick, capturing the excitement and adrenaline, with the energy drink can prominently in the foreground.
Wide shot of multiple riders at the skatepark, all performing tricks, with the camera panning to highlight the energy drink can among them.
Close-up of the rider landing smoothly after the trick, with the camera focusing on their smile and the energy drink can in the background.
Overhead drone shot of the skatepark, showing the rider's path as they soar through the air, with the energy drink can visible on a nearby bench.
segments.audioNotes: Voiceover: 'Unleash your potential and fuel your adventure with every sip.'

segments.description: The rider lands and raises the energy drink can triumphantly, with friends cheering in the background. The camera captures a close-up of the can, highlighting its logo and vibrant colors as the scene fades. The lighting shifts to a more dramatic tone, emphasizing the excitement.
segments.visualPrompt: Close-up of the rider triumphantly raising the energy drink can after a successful trick, surrounded by cheering friends. The can's vibrant colors are highlighted, and the background fades to focus on the product, with dramatic lighting enhancing the excitement.
visualPromptAlternatives: Wide shot of the group celebrating together, with the energy drink can prominently displayed in the front, capturing the camaraderie and energy of the moment.
Medium shot of the rider holding the can close to their face, smiling and ready to take a sip, with friends celebrating in the background.
Dynamic shot of the rider tossing the can to a friend, showcasing the product in action and the fun atmosphere.
Close-up of the can with water droplets glistening on its surface, emphasizing freshness, as the background fades out.
segments.audioNotes: Voiceover: 'Try it now and feel the rush! Boost your energy for every adventure!'
